name: Liam Johnson
routine: Liam Johnson generally goes to bed around midnight and wakes up at 7am for his college classes.
occupation: Liam Johnson is a college sophomore studying Graphic Design. He often spends nights working on projects.
thoughts: Liam Johnson is preparing for his mid-term exams for the week of February 1st and is feeling slightly stressed about the workload.
lifestyle: Liam Johnson loves skateboarding and often uses it as his mode of transportation around campus and the city.

name: Elena Petrova
routine: Elena sleeps at 10pm and wakes up at 6am to prepare her children for school before heading to work.
occupation: Elena is a high school teacher, teaching history in St. Petersburg. Her school day starts at 8 am and ends at 3 pm.
thoughts: Elena recently has been concerned about her son's performance in school and is considering getting him a tutor. She plans to discuss this with her husband over the weekend.
lifestyle: Elena follows a typical Russian cuisine, enjoys classical music to unwind, and spends her weekends at the local park with her family. She prefers reading historical novels in her spare time.

name: Geoffrey Atkins
routine: Geoffrey goes to bed at 9pm and is up by 5:00 am to take his dog for a walk.
occupation: Now retired, Geoffrey was a history professor and spends his time writing articles and giving guest lectures.
thoughts: He is preparing a lecture on modern history to be delivered on the 3rd of February, 2024, which brings back memories of his teaching days.
lifestyle: Geoffrey enjoys a slow-paced lifestyle, often reads historical biographies, and has a preference for classical music and quiet evenings with a glass of fine whiskey.
